full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SKYER SGANG LUGS KYI RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS BGEGS DPUNG KUN 'JOMS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014B (CES SHIS PA BRJOD CING ME TOG GTONG TSUL 'DI PADMA DBANG CHEN RNAL 'BYOR PA, CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN ZHES BYA'I DGE SLONG GIS, ,DAD LDAN SLOB MA MGON PO DBANG RGYAL GYI, ,GNAS SKABS MTHAR THUG 'DOD DON 'GRUB PA'I PHYIR, ,DAM PA'I MAN NGAG JI BZHIN YI GER BKOD, ,CES SKYER SGANG PA LUGS KYI RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI SGRUB THABS BGEGS DPUNG KUN 'JOMS ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG DAD PA DANG GTONG BA DANG SHES RAB DANG, RNAM DPYOD SOGS DAM PAS BSNGAGS PA'I YON TAN DANG LDAN PA, SKAL BZANG MGON PO DBANG GI RGYAL POS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES NAN GYIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN GYIS, CHOS GRVA CHEN PO BKRA SHIS LHUN POR 'PHRAL DU SBYAR BA'O, ,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG CHOS KYI RGYAL MTSAN,
